- Location: Exterior, first-floor brick wall with a paired set of double-hung windows; white trim and concrete sill.

- Materials: Brick veneer; painted wood/trim around aluminum/vinyl window frames; white painted sill.

- Condition: Paint peeling/chipping on the sill and lower trim; minor surface dirt.

- Glass/trim: Glass panes appear intact; blinds installed; no visible cracks.

- Maintenance/notes: Repaint/seal sill trim to prevent moisture intrusion; inspect brick/trim joint caulking for deterioration. Security sticker on left window.
